sys_script_include.name: GetUserCompany

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_870b1461477f35107272a3c9316d4360
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1296763_expense.GetUserCompany</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetUserCompany</name><script><![CDATA[var GetUserCompany = Class.create();
GetUserCompany.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getCompany: function() {
      var userRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
      userRecord.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_userID'));
      return userRecord.company.getUniqueValue() + ';' + userRecord.company.name;
   },
   type: 'GetUserCompany'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-17 12:09:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>870b1461477f35107272a3c9316d4360</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetUserCompany</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Expense Reimbursement" source="x_1296763_expense">14e41ab847bf71107272a3c9316d437a</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Expense Reimbursement">14e41ab847bf71107272a3c9316d437a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_870b1461477f35107272a3c9316d4360</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-17 13:26:17</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
